data.md:MetaData: Pollen profile WILLIA25, William King Flour Mill, United Kingdom
Bog in river. Physiography: riverine. Surrounding vegetation: bog and urban area. Location: South of Kings Mill way. Notes: Palaeo-Mesolithic site
A palaeoenvironmental context for Terminal Upper Palaeolithic and Mesolithic activity in the Colne Valley: Offsite records contemporary with occupation at Three Ways Wharf, Uxbridge
